title: How to pay for Spotify Premium on an iPhone - Quora

response.answer_text: How to pay for Spotify Premium on iPhone: Head to Spotify’s website and log in with your credentials (or sign up)Tap the 3 line icon in the top right cornerTap either Premium or UpgradeTap Start Free TrialEnter your credit or debit card info, then click Start 30-Day Trial NowHere’s how the process looks:

At least in the Spanish version, when you open the app you find at the downright corner a button called “Plans”. Click on it and you’ll get to the Plans screen , in which you can choose the plan that better matches your needs
